definition: home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc

sentences.english: Would you give up your life to save the president of your country?
sentences.chinese: 你会舍身救你的国家元首吗？

sentences.english: It is diplomatic protocol for all visiting heads of state to lay a wreath here.
sentences.chinese: 所有来访的国家元首敬献花圈都是外交礼仪。

sentences.english: Theoretically, the monarch embodies supremacy as head of state. P130
sentences.chinese: 理论上，君主如同国家元首般享有至高无上的权力。

sentences.english: The parliament then elects a president, who functions as the head of state.
sentences.chinese: 然后再由国会选举总统，作为国家元首。

sentences.english: Guinea-Bissau first head of state dies.
sentences.chinese: 几内亚比绍首任国家元首去世。

sentences.english: The Olympic Games shall be proclaimed open by the Head of State of the host country.
sentences.chinese: 奥运会由东道国国家元首宣布开幕。

sentences.english: It's a head of state issue.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个国家元首的问题。

sentences.english: The president, elected by popular vote every five years, serves as the head of state.
sentences.chinese: 总统作为国家元首每五年由全民普选产生。

sentences.english: Katsav is the history of Israel's first head of state trial.
sentences.chinese: 卡察夫是以色列历史上第一个接受审判的国家元首。

sentences.english: President Patil's visit will be the first visit to China by an Indian head of state in a decade.
sentences.chinese: 帕蒂尔总统此访是印度国家元首十年来首次访华。

sentences.english: In England, the sovereign reigns but does not rule.
sentences.chinese: 在英国，君主是国家元首，但不治理国事。

sentences.english: The visiting head of state was given the honour of a twenty-one salute.
sentences.chinese: 来访的国家元首领受了二十一响礼炮的礼遇。

sentences.english: How many heads of state and government will be present at the opening ceremony?
sentences.chinese: 有多少国家元首和政府首脑将出席本届亚运会开幕式？

sentences.english: Head-of-State Immunity is one of the most ancient topics of International Law.
sentences.chinese: 国家元首豁免是国际法发展史中较古老的课题。

sentences.english: The heads of state and government have to seize with it" (Olcay Ünver, coordinator of the final report of the Forum of Istanbul)."
sentences.chinese: 国家元首和政府必须把握它。

sentences.english: In the United States, the president is both head of state and head of government.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，总统是国家元首民时也是政府首脑。

definition: prime minister (of Japan or UK etc)
president (title of the head of state of China and several other nations)
Foreign Secretary/(UK) Secretary of State for Foreign and Commonwealth Affairs
Robert Mugabe (1924-), Zimbabwean ZANU-PF politician, president of Zimbabwe 1987-2017
